gw.api.util

Class TypecodeMapper

  • gw.api.util.TypecodeMapper

  • public class TypecodeMapper
    TypecodeMapper represents the interface that maps external typecodes to internal typecodes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsMappingFor(String typelist)
      Does this mapper contain any mappings for the given typelist?
      String getAliasByInternalCode(String typelist, String namespace, String code)
      For use during exports, returns a string corresponding to an alias to an internal typecode given a typelist, a namespace, and an internal code. If no match is found, returns null. If more than one match is found, throws a NonUniqueAliasException.
      String[] getAliasesByInternalCode(String typelist, String namespace, String code)
      For use during exports, returns an array of strings representing external aliases to internal typecodes given a typelist, a namespace, and an internal code. If no aliases are found, then a zero-length, non-null array is returned. A namespace generally corresponds to an external integration source, but multiple namespaces per source are allowed. NOTE: this method allows multiple aliases to correspond to the same namespace-typecode tuple. If you require a namespace-typecode to resolve to a single alias, please use getAliasByInternalCode.
      String getInternalCodeByAlias(String typelist, String namespace, String alias)
      For use during imports, returns a string corresponding to a typecode in the given typelist that matches the given namespace/alias. If no match is found, returns null. If more than one match is found, throws a NonUniqueTypecodeException.
      String[] getInternalCodesByAlias(String typelist, String namespace, String alias)
      For use during imports, returns an array of strings representing typecodes given a typelist, a namespace, and an alias. If no typecodes are found, will return a zero-length, non-null array. A namespace generally corresponds to an external integration source, but multiple namespaces per source are allowed. NOTE: this method allows multiple typecodes to use the same namespace-alias tuple. If you require a namespace-alias to resolve to a single typecode, please use getInternalCodeByAlias.

    • Method Detail

      • containsMappingFor

        boolean containsMappingFor(String typelist)
        Does this mapper contain any mappings for the given typelist?
        Parameters:
        typelist - a typelist name
        Returns:
        true if the mapper has a mapping for typelist, false otherwise

      • getAliasByInternalCode

        String getAliasByInternalCode(String typelist,
                            String namespace,
                            String code)
        For use during exports, returns a string corresponding to an alias to an internal typecode given a typelist, a namespace, and an internal code. If no match is found, returns null. If more than one match is found, throws a NonUniqueAliasException.
        Parameters:
        typelist - the name of the given typelist (case-insensitive)
        namespace - the given namespace (case-insensitive)
        code - the given typecode (case-insensitive)
        Returns:
        string corresponding to a typecode; null if no match found

      • getAliasesByInternalCode

        String[] getAliasesByInternalCode(String typelist,
                                String namespace,
                                String code)
        For use during exports, returns an array of strings representing external aliases to internal typecodes given a typelist, a namespace, and an internal code. If no aliases are found, then a zero-length, non-null array is returned. A namespace generally corresponds to an external integration source, but multiple namespaces per source are allowed. NOTE: this method allows multiple aliases to correspond to the same namespace-typecode tuple. If you require a namespace-typecode to resolve to a single alias, please use getAliasByInternalCode.
        Parameters:
        typelist - the name of the given typelist (case-insensitive)
        namespace - the given namespace (case-insensitive)
        code - the given typecode (case-insensitive)
        Returns:
        string array of aliases, or a zero-length, non-null string array if no aliases match

      • getInternalCodeByAlias

        String getInternalCodeByAlias(String typelist,
                            String namespace,
                            String alias)
        For use during imports, returns a string corresponding to a typecode in the given typelist that matches the given namespace/alias. If no match is found, returns null. If more than one match is found, throws a NonUniqueTypecodeException.
        Parameters:
        typelist - the name of the given typelist (case-insensitive)
        namespace - the given namespace (case-insensitive)
        alias - the given alias (case-insensitive)
        Returns:
        string corresponding to a typecode; null if no match found

      • getInternalCodesByAlias

        String[] getInternalCodesByAlias(String typelist,
                               String namespace,
                               String alias)
        For use during imports, returns an array of strings representing typecodes given a typelist, a namespace, and an alias. If no typecodes are found, will return a zero-length, non-null array. A namespace generally corresponds to an external integration source, but multiple namespaces per source are allowed. NOTE: this method allows multiple typecodes to use the same namespace-alias tuple. If you require a namespace-alias to resolve to a single typecode, please use getInternalCodeByAlias.
        Parameters:
        typelist - the name of the given typelist (case-insensitive)
        namespace - the given namespace (case-insensitive)
        alias - the given alias (case-insensitive)
        Returns:
        string array of typecodes, or a zero-length, non-null string array if no typecodes match
